General.Name: Kapsch Traffic
General.Description: Kapsch TrafficCom AG, together with its subsidiaries, provides intelligent transportation systems in Austria, Europe, the Middle East, Africa, Asia-Pacific, and the Americas. It operates through two segments, Tolling and Traffic Management. The company offers solutions, including tolling, tolling services, traffic management, and traffic demand management. It serves cities, freeways, tunnels, and bridges. The company was founded in 1892 and is headquartered in Vienna, Austria. Kapsch TrafficCom AG is a subsidiary of KAPSCH-Group Beteiligungs GmbH.
